coreNumbers.title: Core Numbers
coreNumbers.lifePathDesc: Your life purpose and the path you walk

13.label: Perseverance
13.meaning: Learning perseverance and focus. Past laziness or taking shortcuts requires extra effort to build solid foundations.
13.lesson: Build through steady, honest work rather than shortcuts

14.label: Moderation
14.meaning: Learning moderation and commitment. Past abuse of freedom requires developing self-control and responsibility.
14.lesson: Embrace healthy boundaries while honoring commitments

16.label: Humility
16.meaning: Learning humility and authentic connection. Past ego-driven actions require rebuilding trust and integrity.
16.lesson: Cultivate genuine humility and rebuild from within

19.label: Independence
19.meaning: Learning independence with compassion. Past selfishness requires balancing personal power with service to others.
19.lesson: Balance self-reliance with openness to others

0.brief: The infinite potential and divine source.
0.description: Zero represents unlimited potential, the void from which all things emerge. It carries the vibration of eternity, wholeness, and the divine. This is the number of infinite possibilities.
0.dayGuidance: A day of infinite potential. All paths are open. Trust in the universe's guidance.
0.monthGuidance: A month of unlimited possibilities. Stay open to divine guidance and new beginnings.
0.yearGuidance: A year of profound spiritual connection. The universe supports your highest path.

1.description: One energy is about new beginnings, self-reliance, and forging your own path. It carries the vibration of originality, ambition, and the courage to stand alone. This is the number of initiative and independent action.
1.dayGuidance: Take initiative today. Start something new, make bold decisions, and trust your instincts to lead.
1.monthGuidance: A month for new beginnings and taking the lead. Plant seeds for projects you want to grow. Assert yourself.
1.yearGuidance: A year of fresh starts, planting seeds, and stepping into leadership. Major new chapters begin now.

2.brief: The peacemaker, partner, and sensitive soul.
2.description: Two energy is about cooperation, balance, and working with others. It carries the vibration of diplomacy, patience, and emotional sensitivity. This is the number of relationships and intuitive receptivity.
2.dayGuidance: Focus on collaboration today. Listen more than you speak. Partnerships and compromise bring success.
2.monthGuidance: A month for nurturing relationships and finding balance. Patience is rewarded. Work behind the scenes.
2.yearGuidance: A year of partnerships, patience, and tending to details. Let things develop slowly. Support others.

3.brief: The artist, communicator, and joyful spirit.
3.description: Three energy is about self-expression, creativity, and joy. It carries the vibration of communication, optimism, and artistic talent. This is the number of inspiration and social connection.
3.dayGuidance: Express yourself freely today. Create, communicate, and connect socially. Let joy guide your actions.
3.monthGuidance: A month for creative projects and social activities. Share your ideas. Embrace optimism and playfulness.
3.yearGuidance: A year of creative expansion and self-expression. Your voice matters. Pursue artistic and social opportunities.

4.brief: The architect, worker, and practical foundation.
4.description: Four energy is about structure, hard work, and building solid foundations. It carries the vibration of discipline, organization, and practical achievement. This is the number of stability and determined effort.
4.dayGuidance: Focus on practical tasks today. Build systems, organize, and put in the work. Solid foundations matter.
4.monthGuidance: A month for hard work and building structure. Get organized. Focus on responsibilities and long-term goals.
4.yearGuidance: A year of building and hard work. Lay foundations for the future. Discipline and persistence pay off.

5.brief: The explorer, freedom-seeker, and agent of change.
5.description: Five energy is about freedom, change, and new experiences. It carries the vibration of adventure, versatility, and dynamic movement. This is the number of transformation and sensory exploration.
5.dayGuidance: Embrace change today. Try something new, be flexible, and welcome unexpected opportunities.
5.monthGuidance: A month of change and variety. Travel, explore, and break free from routine. Adaptability is key.
5.yearGuidance: A year of major changes and new freedom. Life accelerates. Embrace adventure and release what holds you back.

6.brief: The caregiver, healer, and keeper of harmony.
6.description: Six energy is about love, responsibility, and domestic harmony. It carries the vibration of nurturing, beauty, and service to others. This is the number of home, family, and healing.
6.dayGuidance: Focus on home and loved ones today. Nurture relationships. Create beauty and harmony in your space.
6.monthGuidance: A month for family, home, and responsibilities. Take care of others. Focus on domestic harmony and beauty.
6.yearGuidance: A year centered on home, family, and responsibilities. Relationships deepen. Service to others brings fulfillment.

7.brief: The mystic, analyst, and spiritual searcher.
7.description: Seven energy is about introspection, wisdom, and spiritual depth. It carries the vibration of analysis, intuition, and inner knowing. This is the number of contemplation and deeper understanding.
7.dayGuidance: Seek solitude and reflection today. Research, study, or meditate. Not ideal for big social gatherings.
7.monthGuidance: A month for inner work and study. Seek knowledge. Trust your intuition. Quality over quantity in all things.
7.yearGuidance: A year of spiritual growth and inner development. Study, reflect, and trust your intuition. Answers come from within.

8.brief: The achiever, authority, and master of abundance.
8.description: Eight energy is about power, success, and material achievement. It carries the vibration of authority, ambition, and karmic balance. This is the number of manifestation and executive ability.
8.dayGuidance: Focus on business and finances today. Make power moves. Your authority and competence are recognized.
8.monthGuidance: A month for career advancement and financial matters. Step into your power. Business dealings favored.
8.yearGuidance: A year of achievement and recognition. Career peaks. Financial opportunities arrive. Use power wisely.

9.brief: The compassionate healer and universal lover.
9.description: Nine energy is about completion, compassion, and universal love. It carries the vibration of wisdom, humanitarianism, and letting go. This is the number of endings that make way for new beginnings.
9.dayGuidance: Release what no longer serves you today. Give generously. Focus on the greater good and closure.
9.monthGuidance: A month of endings and completion. Tie up loose ends. Forgiveness and compassion bring peace.
9.yearGuidance: A year of completion and release. Let go of the old. Humanitarian work fulfills you. Prepare for a new cycle.

11.brief: The spiritual messenger and illuminated visionary.
11.description: Eleven is a master number of spiritual insight and intuition amplified. It carries the vibration of inspiration, enlightenment, and channeled wisdom. This is the number of the spiritual teacher and psychic awareness.
11.dayGuidance: Trust your intuition completely today. Spiritual insights flow freely. You may inspire others profoundly.
11.monthGuidance: A month of heightened intuition and spiritual downloads. Share your vision. Inspiration strikes unexpectedly.
11.yearGuidance: A year of spiritual awakening and intuitive breakthroughs. Your vision can inspire many. Honor your sensitivity.

22.brief: The architect of dreams and builder of legacies.
22.description: Twenty-two is a master number of practical idealism and large-scale achievement. It carries the vibration of turning visions into reality and building lasting structures. This is the number of the master architect.
22.energy: Mastery, large-scale building, practical vision, legacy
22.dayGuidance: Think big today. Your ability to manifest grand visions is amplified. Build something that lasts.
22.monthGuidance: A month for ambitious projects and practical mastery. Turn dreams into concrete reality. Lead large initiatives.
22.yearGuidance: A year to build your legacy. Grand visions can become reality. You have the power to create lasting structures.

33.brief: The cosmic healer and uplifter of humanity.
33.description: Thirty-three is a master number of compassionate teaching and selfless service. It carries the vibration of the master healer, spiritual guide, and uplifter of humanity. This is the number of the cosmic parent.
33.energy: Healing, teaching, selfless service, cosmic love
33.dayGuidance: Your healing presence is amplified today. Teach through love. Your compassion can transform others.
33.monthGuidance: A month for healing work and spiritual teaching. Serve others selflessly. Your guidance uplifts many.
33.yearGuidance: A year of profound service and teaching. You are called to heal and uplift. Cosmic love flows through you.

meanings.1: Independence, leadership, and pioneering new paths
meanings.4: Building, structure, and laying solid foundations

challengeMeanings.0: Choice of all challenges - freedom to choose your path

narrative.title: Your Personal Narrative
narrative.subtitle: Your cosmic story and life themes
narrative.notAvailableDesc: We calculated your Soul Path, but couldn't generate a full interpretation right now. Your placements are saved — please try again in a moment.

planets.title: Planetary Placements
planets.subtitle: Your unique planetary signature
planets.deepDiveTitle: What Your Planets Mean For You
planets.description: These show how different parts of you express themselves—your drive, your communication style, how you love and relate.
planets.sunDesc: Your core sense of self and vitality.
planets.moonDesc: Your emotional landscape and inner world.
planets.mercuryDesc: How you think, communicate, and process information.
planets.venusDesc: How you love, connect, and find beauty.
planets.marsDesc: Your drive, desire, and how you take action.
planets.jupiterDesc: Where you expand, believe, and find meaning.
planets.saturnDesc: Where you build structure and meet responsibility.
planets.uranusDesc: Where you innovate, rebel, and seek freedom.
planets.neptuneDesc: Where you dream, dissolve boundaries, and connect to the sacred.
planets.plutoDesc: Where you transform, release, and reclaim power.
planets.chironDesc: Where healing emerges from your deepest wounds.

houses.title: Houses
houses.subtitle: The 12 life areas of your chart
houses.deepDiveTitle: What Your Houses Mean For You
houses.description: Houses show where life themes unfold—which arenas of life ask the most of you, and where certain energies come alive.
houses.firstDesc: How you meet the world and present yourself.
houses.secondDesc: Your relationship with resources, worth, and stability.
houses.thirdDesc: How you communicate, learn, and connect nearby.
houses.fourthDesc: Your inner foundation, home, and emotional roots.
houses.fifthDesc: Where you create, play, and express joy.
houses.sixthDesc: Your daily rhythms, work, and well-being.
houses.seventhDesc: How you partner, reflect, and relate one-to-one.
houses.eighthDesc: Where you merge, transform, and face the unknown.
houses.ninthDesc: Your search for meaning, belief, and expansion.
houses.tenthDesc: Your public role, career, and visible legacy.
houses.eleventhDesc: Your vision for community, friendship, and the future.
houses.twelfthDesc: Your inner sanctuary, solitude, and the sacred.

aspects.title: Aspects
aspects.subtitle: The conversations between your planets
aspects.deepDiveTitle: What Your Aspects Mean For You
aspects.description: Aspects show how different inner parts of you interact—where they support, challenge, or intensify each other.

patterns.title: Major Patterns
patterns.deepDiveTitle: What Your Patterns Mean For You
patterns.subtitle: Major configurations in your chart
patterns.description: Patterns are large-scale energetic shapes in your chart—where several planets connect to form a recognizable theme or recurring dynamic.
patterns.noPatterns: No major patterns detected in your chart.
patterns.tSquareDesc: A T-Square creates tension between three areas of life, asking you to find creative solutions. It often feels like productive friction—pressure that pushes you toward growth, innovation, and resilience. This pattern tends to keep you moving forward, even when stillness might feel easier.
patterns.grandTrineDesc: A Grand Trine forms a triangle of ease and flow, where energy moves smoothly between three areas. This can feel like natural talent or effortless grace. The invitation is to activate this gift consciously rather than letting it remain passive—talent unused doesn't always become mastery.

energyShape.title: Energy Shape
energyShape.deepDiveTitle: What Your Energy Shape Means For You
energyShape.subtitle: Element and modality balance
energyShape.description: This shows how energy moves through you—the underlying rhythm of your chart and where certain qualities concentrate or disperse.
energyShape.dayChartDesc: Your chart is oriented toward visibility and outward expression. Life often asks you to show up, be seen, and engage with the external world.
energyShape.nightChartDesc: Your chart is oriented toward inner reflection and subtlety. Life often unfolds through inner processing, quiet observation, and behind-the-scenes work.
energyShape.chartRulerDesc: This planet guides the overall direction of your life and filters how you engage with the world.
energyShape.dominantPlanetsDesc: These planets shape your experience most strongly—they appear in multiple key positions or form important connections.
energyShape.dominantSignsDesc: These signs color how you move through the world. Their qualities show up repeatedly in how you express yourself.
energyShape.elementModalityDesc: Elements show where your energy naturally gathers—whether in inspiration (fire), grounding (earth), thought (air), or emotion (water). Modalities reflect how you engage—whether you initiate (cardinal), stabilize (fixed), or adapt (mutable).

intensityZones.title: Intensity Zones
intensityZones.deepDiveTitle: What Your Intensity Zones Mean For You
intensityZones.subtitle: Where energy clusters in your chart
intensityZones.description: This shows where life feels concentrated—where multiple planets gather, creating areas of heightened focus and recurring themes.
intensityZones.signEmphasisDesc: Multiple planets in these signs amplify their qualities—you might notice these themes appearing repeatedly in how you think, feel, and respond.
intensityZones.houseEmphasisDesc: These life areas ask a lot of you—they're where complexity, growth, and attention naturally gather.
intensityZones.stelliumDesc: A stellium here creates a concentrated beam of attention—multiple inner parts converging on one theme. This area tends to feel vivid, complex, and central to your experience.

direction.title: Direction
direction.deepDiveTitle: What Your Direction Means For You
direction.subtitle: North Node, South Node, and life path
direction.description: This reflects growth, healing, and familiarity—where you're invited to stretch, where you naturally return, and where old wounds become sources of wisdom.
direction.northNodeDesc: Your North Node is an invitation toward growth and unfamiliar territory. It points to qualities you're developing, even when they don't feel natural yet. This is where life asks you to stretch—not because you lack something, but because expansion lives here.
direction.southNodeDesc: Your South Node represents familiar patterns and natural comfort. These are qualities you carry easily, perhaps from early life or past experience. The South Node isn't something to abandon, but rather a foundation to honor while you reach toward the North Node's invitation.
direction.chironDesc: Chiron shows where healing and teaching emerge from your deepest wounds. What once hurt can become a source of compassion and guidance for others. Chiron doesn't promise that the wound disappears, but that it becomes medicine.

joy.title: Part of Fortune
joy.description: This reflects ease, joy, and natural alignment—where life feels generous and where you access flow without force.
joy.meaning: The Part of Fortune shows where natural joy and ease flow most readily in your life. This isn't about achievement or effort—it's where things align organically, where you feel instinctively at home.

errors.signInRequired: Please sign in to view your Soul Path.
errors.incompleteProfileDesc: We need your full birth date, time, and location in Settings before Solara can generate your Soul Path.
errors.birthDetailsRequiredMessage: We need your complete birth details to calculate your chart.

connections.subtitle: Map the people in your orbit and explore relational insights
connections.noConnections: No connections yet. Add someone to begin exploring relational insights.
connections.noConnectionsMessage: Add your first connection to explore your relationship dynamics.
connections.notesPlaceholder: Jot down thoughts, patterns, or things you want to remember about this connection...

form.unknownTime: I don't know their birth time

spaceBetween.title: The Space Between
spaceBetween.subtitle: Your relationship blueprint with {connectionName}
spaceBetween.discoverDescription: Generate your permanent relationship blueprint with {connectionName}. This deep insight is created once and saved forever.

location.title: Help Solara match your sky
location.body:
To generate your insights at the start of your day, Solara needs to know roughly where in the world you are.

We use this only to calculate your time zone so your daily, weekly, and monthly guidance refreshes at the right local time.

If you skip this, we'll use UTC as a default. Solara will still work, but your timing might feel a bit off.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

deletion.noCode: No confirmation code provided. Please use the link from your data deletion confirmation.
deletion.notFound: Deletion request not found. The confirmation code may be invalid or expired.
deletion.contactSupport: Please contact us at solara@solarainsights.com for assistance.

pending.title: Pending
pending.description: Your data deletion request has been received and is waiting to be processed.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Your data is currently being deleted from our systems.

completed.title: Completed
completed.description: Your data has been successfully deleted from Solara Insights.
completed.permanentNotice: All your personal data associated with your Facebook account has been permanently deleted from Solara Insights. This action cannot be undone.

failed.title: Failed
failed.description: There was an issue processing your deletion request. Please contact support.

userNotFound.title: No Data Found
userNotFound.description: No account was found associated with your Facebook account. No data needed to be deleted.

learn.onePageADay: One page a day keeps the fog away.

home.selectTwoSigns: Select two signs to discover their cosmic connection.
home.learnSubtitle: Bite-sized lessons to deepen your cosmic understanding.

compatibility.wantPersonalized: Want personalized compatibility based on your full birth charts?
